name: getDeployment
description: Retrieves information for a deployment either by supplying its ID (`id` property) or Hostname (`url` property). Additional details will be included when the authenticated user is an owner of the deployment.

idOrUrl.description: The unique identifier or hostname of the deployment.

withGitRepoInfo.description: Whether to add in gitRepo information.

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.
